data.name: About Alex
data: I live in Norwich(UK), with my beautiful girlfriend Mez. Put simply I'm a massive Geek. I love all things tech, am a firm believer in an open and borderless internet, and am an open source advocate.
Professionaly, I am a Web Developer at Everpress & Brilliant Basics, and co-founder of a Form Analytics company.
In my spare time, I enjoy Cycling, watching films, HackerNews (yes - that's an activity all of it's own), Listening to music, and dabbling in the latest developer frameworks, tools and engines.

data.name: Personal Information

data.name: Work History
data: Oct 2013 - Current
Associate Developer at Brilliant Basics

Brilliant Basics is a global design and product studio. I worked as an Associate Developer and worked on a wide array of projects & products. Working mostly in Laravel, I was responsible for efficient & scalable backend systems.
Nov 2012 - Oct 2013
Website Co-Ordinator at Anglian Home Improvements

I worked in the Digital Marketing team within Anglianâ€™s National Marketing Department and was responsible for timely updates to a range of mediums including the core Marketing & Sales site (http://www.anglianhome.co.uk), reporting on core performance metrics (of Web Assets) and supporting various other marketing ventures.

data.name: Projects
data: OurLib - Build & Launch a Startup in 54 Hours
I attended SyncNorwich's SyncTheCity event and together with my team we won the competition.
We built two applications (Web and Mobile), one platform (Node.js) and a business model to support the venture going forward.
Read more: http://www.ourlib.co.uk/
FormFrog - A Form Analytics Startup

FormFrog is Form Analytics solution which provides data on how your visitors are using your checkout, survey, signup or contact forms. Along with giving you a clearer picture of form performance, FormFrog gives you a second chance to contact those visitors who left enough info to contact but didn't complete your forms (for whatever reason).
Read more: http://getformfrog.com
Laravel Notifications - A notification package for Laravel
I created a package for Laravel to ease adding a notification layer to your application.
Read more: https://github.com/Illizian/laravel-notifications
